author: billbarker
msg: Update to include the APR classes.

This is mostly to get Remy's stuff in the Gump build.  It likely to be a very long time before jakarta-tomcat-5's dependencies build, and hopefully by then I'll have modified the gumpy-build target to use the Gump jars instead of re-building.
Doesn't effect the TC 5.5 build at all, the TC 3.3 patch is to follow, and AFAIK, those are the only versions using HEAD.

author: mturk
msg: Instead duplicating entire Socket API, duplicate APR API.

msg: - Remove useless pool field in SendfileData.
